ApiKey.Name: API Key
ApiKey.Hint: Your Quickbrush API key. Get one at https://quickbrush.ai/dashboard

SaveFolder.Name: Image Save Folder
SaveFolder.Hint: Folder name where generated images will be saved (default: quickbrush-images)

Dialog.Title: Generate Image with Quickbrush
Dialog.DescriptionPlaceholder: Long-form text of what you want to generate. Feel free to copy/paste entire journal entries, notes, etc. We can hone in on what's important.
Dialog.PromptPlaceholder: Add mood, pose, or details about exactly what you want to see.
Dialog.Type: What do you want to paint?

Notifications.NoApiKey: Please set your Quickbrush API key in module settings
Notifications.Generating: Generating image with Quickbrush. We'll notify you when it's ready!
Notifications.RateLimit: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait before generating another image.
Notifications.InsufficientBrushstrokes: Insufficient brushstrokes. Visit https://quickbrush.ai/dashboard to purchase more.

Gallery.Title: Quickbrush Gallery
Gallery.Description: This journal contains all images generated with Quickbrush.
Gallery.EntryTemplate:
{type} - {date}

Description: {description}

Quality: {quality} | Aspect Ratio: {aspectRatio}
